definition: (one's) last straw to clutch at/one's last hope
(fig.) to clutch at straws (in desperation)/to take advantage of the situation (unscrupulously)
the straw that broke the camel’s back (idiom)/the final straw
pinyin: ya1 si3 luo4 tuo5 de5 zui4 hou4 yi1 gen1 dao4 cao3
containing_words.word: 壓死駱駝的最後一根稻草

sentences.english: It's kind of like a little wall of straw that you hide behind.
sentences.chinese: 就是用稻草堆起來的一堵小牆，人躲在其後。

sentences.english: A crude bed was covered by thick straws.
sentences.chinese: 一張簡陋的大竹牀鋪着厚厚的稻草。

sentences.english: The first pig found some straw, and he built a fine house with straw, and he built a fine house with straw.
sentences.chinese: 第一隻小豬找到一些稻草，他蓋了一座漂亮的草房子。

sentences.english: The last straw breaks the camels back.
sentences.chinese: 最後一根稻草能垮駱駝的背。

sentences.english: One material that is commonly added to strengthen the adobe is straw.
sentences.chinese: 最常用來加入土坯中以增強強度的材料是稻草。

sentences.english: A drowing man will catch at a straw .
sentences.chinese: 溺者求生心最切，一根稻草也要抓。

sentences.english: So she made a fire on her hearth, and threw in some straw.
sentences.chinese: 所以她就在爐膛裏生起一把火，並且扔進去一些稻草。

sentences.english: There was an egg , stained with chicken droppings , laying on the straw under the buttocks of the cock.
sentences.chinese: 它屁股底下的稻草上，有一枚沾着雞屎的雞蛋。
稻草減輕了她下跌的衝撞力。

sentences.english: On the rice straw under the cock's butt was an egg with some droppings.
sentences.chinese: 它屁股底下的稻草上，有一枚沾着雞屎的雞蛋。

sentences.english: The eldest built his house with straw, because he thought it is easy to do.
sentences.chinese: 老大用稻草來蓋房子，因爲他覺得這樣不會太費勁。

sentences.english: As the fertilizer and water break down the straw, the straw produces heat.
sentences.chinese: 由於化肥和水將稻草分解，稻草會產生熱。

sentences.english: As the fertilizer and water break down the straw, the straw produces heat.
sentences.chinese: 由於化肥和水將稻草分解，稻草會產生熱。

sentences.english: Golems of stone, metal, straw, and even flesh exist.
sentences.chinese: 石頭，金屬，稻草，甚至是血肉構成的傀儡存在着。

sentences.english: Ammonium sulfate is against potassium sulfite pulping of rice straw.
sentences.chinese: 硫酸銨對稻草亞硫酸鉀蒸煮有不利影響。
